sentences.en: Eventually Sam persuaded her to accept an offer of marriage.
sentences.cn: 最终萨姆说服她接受了求婚。

sentences.en: He accepted the invitation to stay with us.
sentences.cn: 他接受了邀请来我们家住。

sentences.en: He could never accept that he had been at fault.
sentences.cn: 他怎么也无法承认是他的错。

sentences.en: He displayed a curmudgeonly unwillingness to accept the voters' verdict.
sentences.cn: 他态度恶劣，显得很不情愿接受选举人的意见。

sentences.en: He readily accepted her invitation (=  accepted it quickly  ) .
sentences.cn: 他欣然接受了她的邀请。

sentences.en: He would have to accept it; there was no other way.
sentences.cn: 对此他将别无选择，只有接受。

sentences.en: His school reports said that he is always ready to accept a challenge (=  agree to do something difficult  ) .
sentences.cn: 他的学业报告上说他乐于接受挑战。

sentences.en: I find it unbelievable that people can accept this sort of behaviour.
sentences.cn: 人们竟能接受这样的行为，我震惊不已。

sentences.en: Never accept a ride with people who have been drinking.
sentences.cn: 千万别搭喝了酒的司机开的车。

sentences.en: Okay, with the proviso that Jane agrees, I accept.
sentences.cn: 好，如果简答应，我就接受。

sentences.en: Other psychoanalysts do accept the reality of child sexual abuse.
sentences.cn: 其他心理分析师确实接受了儿童性侵犯的现实。

sentences.en: Please accept this small gift.
sentences.cn: 请收下这份小小的礼物。

sentences.en: Rick accepted her offer of coffee.
sentences.cn: 她请里克喝咖啡，他接受了。

sentences.en: Some of the older telephones still only accept tokens.
sentences.cn: 一些较老式的电话机仍然只收代币。

sentences.en: Students accepted by Stanford Law School had very high scores on the LSAT.
sentences.cn: 斯坦福法学院录取的学生LSAT（法学院入学考试）的成绩非常高。

sentences.en: The army refused to accept orders from the political leadership.
sentences.cn: 军队拒绝接受政界领导层下达的命令。

sentences.en: The company cannot accept responsibility for loss or damage.
sentences.cn: 公司不承担丢失或损坏的责任。

sentences.en: The Council will meet to decide if it should accept his resignation.
sentences.cn: 委员会将召开会议决定是否接受他的辞呈。

sentences.en: The men voted by a four-to-one majority to accept the pay offer.
sentences.cn: 男雇员以4比1的多数票接受了工资条件。

sentences.en: The telephone booths accept 10 and 20 pence coins.
sentences.cn: 电话亭可使用10便士和20便士的硬币。

sentences.en: They don't accept any foolishness when it comes to spending money.
sentences.cn: 在花钱的问题上，他们向来很谨慎。

sentences.en: They offered me a job and I accepted.
sentences.cn: 他们给我一份工作，我接受了。
